title: Every AA does a fixed amount of damage to towers
body:
melee AA does more

There you fixed ADC

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Wind Whistler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pqNbthq0,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-09-27T19:30:49.577+0000)
>
> How would that fix anything?

melee does more damage to turet, and ranged adc can't take them in 2 seconds. literally had a tristana who pressed Q and did 1/2 of turet hp in 1.2 seconds or somethin. if they can take a tower safely they shouldn't do it quickly
It would still scale with attack speed. I would change towers to act like those points in dominion.
mordekaiser would get picked every game
Except the adc role needs some sort of buffs.

> [{quoted}](name=Support Tactics,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pqNbthq0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-27T15:27:43.477+0000)
>
> Except the adc role needs some sort of buffs.

buff them, but do this change so they aren't 100% requiered
